title: Interior Secretary On Drawing New Visitors To National Parks
teaser: Memorial Day is a popular day for Americans to visit the nation's parks and monuments. We speak to the Secretary of the Interior, who oversees the National Park Service.
contentencoded:
Many Americans will use the holiday to visit the nation’s national parks and monuments.

We revisit Jeremy Hobson’s interview with Secretary of the Interior Sally Jewell, who leads the agency that oversees the National Park Service.

  • Here & Now:Â Interior Secretary On Parks, Funding And Polarization In Washington

Guest

  • Sally Jewell, Secretary of the Interior. She tweets @SecretaryJewell.
